00001 /* 
00002  * Class for handling linked lists. 
00003  * By Dave Watson Copyright © 2007
00004  * 
00005  * License: This code is licensed under the terms of the GNU LGPL
00006  * http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html 
00007  */
00008 
00009 #ifndef __JCOM_LIST_H_
00010 #define __JCOM_LIST_H__
00011 
00012 #include <list>
00013 using namespace std;
00014 
00016 template<class T> 
00017 class jcomList {
00018 public:
00019         
00020         jcomList() { };
00021         jcomList(const T& rhs) // copy constructor
00022         { ll.insert(ll.begin(), rhs.begin(), rhs.end()); }
00023         
00024         ~jcomList() { };
00025                 
00026         typedef typename list<T>::iterator jcomListIterator;
00027 
00031         void push_front(const T& x) 
00032         { ll.push_front(x); }
00036         void push_back(const T& x)
00037         { ll.push_back(x); }
00038         
00042         void remove(const T& x)
00043         {
00044                 jcomListIterator i = find(ll.begin(), ll.end(), x);
00045                 if(i != ll.end())
00046                         ll.erase(i);
00047         }
00048         
00049         bool find(const T& x) 
00050         {
00051                 return find(ll.begin(), ll.end(), x) != ll.end();
00052         }
00053         template<typename Predicate>
00054         T& find_if(jcomListIterator first, jcomListIterator last, Predicate pred)
00055         {
00056                 jcomListIterator result;
00057                 while(first != last) {
00058                         result = pred(first, last);
00059                         ++first;
00060                 }
00061                 return result != ll.end() ? result : NULL;
00062         }
00063         
00064         T& element(const T& x) 
00065         {
00066                 jcomListIterator i = find(ll.begin(), ll.end(), x);
00067                 return *i;
00068         }
00069         
00075         template<typename Compare>
00076         void merge(const T& x, Compare comp)
00077         {
00078                 list<T> m;
00079                 m.push_front(x);
00080                 ll.merge(m, comp);
00081         }
00083         int size() { return ll.size(); }
00085         bool empty() const { return ll.empty(); }
00090         jcomListIterator erase(jcomListIterator position) { return ll.erase(position); }
00094         void remove(jcomListIterator position) { ll.erase(position); }
00096         jcomListIterator begin() { return ll.begin(); }
00098         jcomListIterator end() { return ll.end(); }
00100         void clear() { ll.clear(); }
00101         
00102 private:
00103         list<T> ll;
00104 
00105 };
00106 
00107 
00108 #endif // __JCOM_LIST_H__
